title: Between the Scenes - The College Bribery Scam and America's So-Called Meritocracy
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - The College Bribery Scam and America's So-Called Meritocracy
description:
Trevor gives his take on the college admissions bribery scandal and questions the validity of America's status as a meritocracy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
